div.p: I lead the operating systems research group at the Max Planck Institute for Software Systems (MPI-SWS). My research interests lie in the general area of operating systems and networks, with a primary focus on the data center.

Prior to joining MPI-SWS in August 2018, I obtained my PhD from the Allen School of Computer Science and Engineering at the University of Washington. At UW I was part of the systems lab with
Tom Anderson,
Arvind Krishnamurthy, and Simon Peter (at UT Austin) as my advisors.

article.div: I am looking for motivated students (PhD, MSc projects, internships). Send me an email with a brief statement of interest and your CV.
